verses.verse: And <S%H1212>Bezaleel<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>: two <S%H520>cubits<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H520>it<s%>, and a cubit and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H520>it<s%>, and a cubit and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the height of <S%H6967>it<s%>:

And he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H1004>inside<s%> and <S%H2351>outside<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> to it round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And he <S%H3332>cast<s%> for it <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, to be set by the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6471>corners<s%> of <S%H8147>it<s%>; even two <S%H2885>rings<s%> upon the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of <S%H8147>it<s%>, and two <S%H2885>rings<s%> upon the <S%H8145>other<s%> side of <S%H6763>it<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold<s%>.
And he <S%H935>put<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> into the <S%H2885>rings<s%> by the <S%H6763>sides<s%> of the <S%H727>ark<s%>, to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>: two <S%H520>cubits<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H520>there<s%>, and one cubit and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the breadth <S%H7341>there<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, beaten out of one <S%H4749>piece<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he <S%H8147>them<s%>, on the two <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%>;

<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> on the <S%H7098>end<s%> on this <S%H259>side<s%>, and another <S%H3742>cherub<s%> on the other <S%H7098>end<s%> on that <S%H3727>side<s%>: out of the mercy seat <S%H6213>made<s%> he the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> on the <S%H8147>two<s%> ends <S%H7098>there<s%>.

And the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> spread <S%H6566>out<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%> on <S%H4605>high<s%>, and <S%H5526>covered<s%> with their <S%H3671>wings<s%> over the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%>, with their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another<s%>; even to the mercy <S%H3727>seatward<s%> were the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>: two <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H520>there<s%>, and a cubit the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H520>there<s%>, and a cubit and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the height <S%H6967>there<s%>
And he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> to it a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

Also he <S%H6213>made<s%> to it a <S%H4526>border<s%> of an <S%H2948>handbreadth<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>; and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for the <S%H4526>border<s%> there round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And he <S%H3332>cast<s%> for it <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H2885>rings<s%> upon the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6285>corners<s%> that were in the <S%H702>four<s%> feet <S%H7272>there<s%>.
Over <S%H5980>against<s%> the <S%H4526>border<s%> were the <S%H2885>rings<s%>, the <S%H1004>places<s%> for the <S%H905>poles<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> which were upon the <S%H7979>table<s%>, his <S%H7086>dishes<s%>, and his <S%H3709>spoons<s%>, and his <S%H4518>bowls<s%>, and his <S%H7184>pitchers<s%> to <S%H5258>pour<s%> <S%H2004>with<s%>, of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>: of beaten <S%H4749>work<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%>; his <S%H3409>shaft<s%>, and his <S%H7070>branch<s%>, his <S%H1375>bowls<s%>, his <S%H3730>buds<s%>, and his <S%H6525>flowers<s%>, were of the same:

And <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> going <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H6654>sides<s%> there <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> out of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6654>side<s%> <S%H7969>there<s%>, and three <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> out of the <S%H8145>other<s%> side <S%H6654>there<s%>

<S%H7969>Three<s%> <S%H1375>bowls<s%> made after the fashion of <S%H8246>almonds<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>branch<s%>, a <S%H3730>bud<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower<s%>; and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1375>bowls<s%> made like <S%H8246>almonds<s%> in <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7070>branch<s%>, a <S%H3730>bud<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower<s%>: so throughout the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> going <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%>.
And in the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> were <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1375>bowls<s%> made like <S%H8246>almonds<s%>, his <S%H3730>buds<s%>, and his <S%H6525>flowers<s%>:

And a <S%H3730>bud<s%> under <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H3730>same<s%>, and a bud under <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H3730>same<s%>, and a bud under <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H8337>same<s%>, according to the six <S%H7070>branches<s%> going out of <S%H3318>it<s%>.
Their <S%H3730>buds<s%> and their <S%H7070>branches<s%> were of the <S%H259>same<s%>: all of it was one beaten <S%H4749>work<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> his <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5216>lamps<s%>, and his <S%H4457>snuffers<s%>, and his <S%H4289>snuffdishes<s%>, of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>.
Of a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he <S%H3627>it<s%>, and all the vessels there.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>: the <S%H753>length<s%> of it was a <S%H520>cubit<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of it a <S%H520>cubit<s%>; it was <S%H7251>foursquare<s%>; and two <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H6967>height<s%> of <S%H7161>it<s%>; the horns there were of the same.

And he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, both the <S%H1406>top<s%> of <S%H7023>it<s%>, and the sides there round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of <S%H6213>it<s%>: also he made unto it a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for it under the <S%H2213>crown<s%> <S%H8147>there<s%>, by the two <S%H6763>corners<s%> of <S%H8147>it<s%>, upon the two <S%H6654>sides<s%> <S%H1004>there<s%>, to be places for the <S%H905>poles<s%> to carry it <S%H5375>with<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and the <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> of sweet <S%H5561>spices<s%>, according to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H7543>apothecary<s%>.
